With this $4.1M FEDERAL GRANT, Westchester can improve the quality of life for families with children by tackling dangerous, potentially life-threatening lead hazards and conducting healthy homes assessments in hundreds of local housing units. https://lowey.house.gov/media-center/press-releases/lowey-announces-41-million-federal-grant-address-lead-hazards …
Every person, regardless of their economic circumstance, deserves to live in a safe and healthy environment.

With this federal funding, Westchester can improve the quality of life for families with children by tackling dangerous, potentially life-threatening lead hazards and conducting healthy homes assessments in hundreds of local housing units.  https://lowey.house.gov/media-center/press-releases/lowey-announces-41-million-federal-grant-address-lead-hazards …

The deadline to enroll or re-enroll in health insurance through NY’s market is Sat, Dec 15, FOR COVERAGE BEGINNING JAN 1, 2019. If you have questions about signing up for coverage or want to discuss your options w/ a trained professional, visit  https://nystateofhealth.ny.gov/ .

MAJOR ANNOUNCEMENT FOR WESTCHESTER ➜

I'm pleased to announce the awarding of $4.1M in federal funding to the county to address lead hazards in 240 housing units for low-income families w/ children, & to perform healthy homes assessments.  https://bit.ly/2PxLKfw

#TuesdayThoughts: I have great confidence in Mr. Mueller. He is speeding up his work, one indictment after another. We’ll get the truth.

Watch my interview w/ @FiOS1NewsLHV for more thoughts on Mueller, the Gateway project, and the new House Dem Majority  https://bit.ly/2PBlKAg

I am also particularly mindful of the history I am making as the first female Appropriations Chair, and I intend to use this opportunity to continue my life’s work fighting for women and families. https://twitter.com/NitaLowey/status/1072496410380132352 …

The American people have entrusted Democrats with the responsibility of making government work for them, & the Appropriations Committee will lead the way to invest in working families, repair our crumbling infrastructure, and provide robust oversight of the Trump administration.

I am honored that my colleagues on the Steering and Policy Committee have nominated me to serve as Chairwoman of the House Appropriations Committee. https://democrats-appropriations.house.gov/news/press-releases/lowey-statement-on-house-appropriations-committee-chairmanship …

I’m proud to support legislation that would restore reproductive rights to @StateDept’s annual human rights report, maintaining U.S. leadership on behalf of the world’s women across administrations. https://bit.ly/2rwJ5Jw

Today is #HumanRightsDay, and I joined @RepKClark, @RepLoisFrankel, @RepBarbaraLee, & @RepEliotEngel in introducing the #ReproRightsAreHumanRights Act.

The U.S. cannot turn its back on the countless women around the world who are deprived of basic reproductive rights.

I spoke with @FiOS1NewsLHV about the new House Democratic Majority, the Gateway project, and the Mueller investigation. WATCH IT HERE:  http://fios1news.com/news/nita-lowey-discusses-late-president-mueller-report-gateway-tunnel-project/ …

On this #HumanRightsDay, we mark 70 years of the Universal Declaration of Human Rights, which has acted as a consistent reminder that all people are entitled to protection under the international human rights system. I'll continue 2 fight for human rights & dignity for all people
